name: UNSTABLE witch-bridge
description:
Find your way to your destination!

As a witch, you could also conjure up a ladder, but somehow that would be too boring. So build one yourself out of various objects. Unfortunately, it is only more or less stable!

Bugs that are known:

- Flying by standing on one object and dragging another underneath. But I have not yet come up with a simple solution for this.

- If an object is active when the scene is changed, it is somewhat bugged the next time it spawns. After moving it, this is fixed.

- Too few levels ;P
